Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

patRoon 0.1.0.9000

April 2018

  • Added unit tests (using testthat) and fixed several small bugs that were revealed in the process.
  • Continuous integration (CI) with running tests on CircleCI (Linux builds) and AppVeyor (Windows builds) and testing coverage on Codecov. Docker images with patRoon and all its dependencies are automatically pushed on Docker Hub.
  • Many small bug fixes.

Contents

  • 0.1.0.9000

Developed by Rick Helmus.
